sample_collected_by.name: Collected By
sample_collected_by.description: The name of the agency that collected the original sample.

vaccination_history.name: Vaccination History
vaccination_history.description: A description of the vaccines received and the administration dates of a series of vaccinations against a specific disease or a set of diseases.

geo_loc_name_country.name: Country
geo_loc_name_country.description: country of origin of the sample

host_scientific_name.name: Scientific Name
host_scientific_name.description: The taxonomic, or scientific name of the host.

other_anatomical_part.name: Other Anatomical Part
other_anatomical_part.description: An anatomical part of an organism e.g. oropharynx.

purpose_of_sequencing.name: Sequencing Purpose
purpose_of_sequencing.description: The reason that the sample was sequenced.

sequencing_assay_type.name: Sequencing Assay Type
sequencing_assay_type.description: The overarching sequencing methodology that was used to determine the sequence of a biomaterial.

sequencing_instrument.name: Sequencing Instrument
sequencing_instrument.description: The model of the sequencing instrument used.

environmental_material.name: Environmental Material
environmental_material.description: A data field which describes the substance obtained from the natural or man-made environment.

sample_collection_date.name: Collection Date
sample_collection_date.description: the date on which the sample was collected.

bioinformatics_protocol.name: Bioinformatics Protocol
bioinformatics_protocol.description: The name and version number of the bioinformatics protocol used.

depth_of_coverage_value.name: Coverage Depth
depth_of_coverage_value.description: The average number of sequencing reads representing a given nucleotide in the reconstructed sequence.

host_vaccination_status.name: Vaccination Status
host_vaccination_status.description: The vaccination status of the host (fully vaccinated, partially vaccinated, or not vaccinated).

sequence_read_accession.name: Read Accession
sequence_read_accession.description: The sequence read accession is a repository identifier that links raw read data, methodological metadata, and quality control metrics. Repositories include those in the INSDC—the NCBI Sequence Read Archive (SRA), European Nucleotide Archive (ENA), and the DDBJ Sequence Read Archive (DRA), as well as repository(ies) from the CNCB/NGDC (China National Center for Bioinformation, National Genomics Data Center).

other_lineage_clade_name.name: Other Lineage Name
other_lineage_clade_name.description: A data field which describes the name of the lineage or clade. Example Guidance: Provide the Pangolin or Nextstrain lineage/clade name.

breadth_of_coverage_value.name: Coverage Breadth
breadth_of_coverage_value.description: The percentage of the reference genome covered by the sequenced data, to a prescribed depth.

diagnostic_pcr_Ct_value_1.name: PCR Ct
diagnostic_pcr_Ct_value_1.description: The Ct value result from a diagnostic SARS-CoV-2 RT-PCR test.

diagnostic_pcr_protocol_1.name: PCR Protocol
diagnostic_pcr_protocol_1.description: The name and version number of the protocol used for diagnostic marker amplification.

other_anatomical_material.name: Other Anatomical Material
other_anatomical_material.description: A substance obtained from an anatomical part of an organism e.g. tissue, blood.

other_sample_collected_by.name: Other Collected By
other_sample_collected_by.description: The name of the agency that collected the original sample.

host_health_status_details.name: Health Status
host_health_status_details.description: Further details pertaining to the health or disease status of the host at time of collection.

other_host_scientific_name.name: Other Scientific Name
other_host_scientific_name.description: The taxonomic, or scientific name of the host.

prior_Mpox_treatment_agent.name: Treatment Agent
prior_Mpox_treatment_agent.description: A data field which describes the name of the antiviral agent administered during the prior mpox infection.

reference_genome_accession.name: Reference Accession
reference_genome_accession.description: A persistent, unique identifier of a genome database entry.

other_purpose_of_sequencing.name: Other Sequencing Purpose
other_purpose_of_sequencing.description: The reason that the sample was sequenced.

other_sequencing_instrument.name: Other Sequencing Instrument
other_sequencing_instrument.description: The model of the sequencing instrument used.

other_environmental_material.name: Other Environmental Material
other_environmental_material.description: A data field which describes the substance obtained from the natural or man-made environment.

prior_Mpox_infection_isolate.name: Infection Isolate
prior_Mpox_infection_isolate.description: A data field that describes the identifier of the isolate found in the prior mpox infection.

specimen_collector_sample_id.name: Collector ID
specimen_collector_sample_id.description: The specimen_collector_sample_identifier is a unique name or label assigned by the sample collector to each sample.

other_host_health_status_details.name: Other Health Status
other_host_health_status_details.description: Further details pertaining to the health or disease status of the host at time of collection.

host_residence_geo_loc_name_country.name: Country of Residence
host_residence_geo_loc_name_country.description: The country where the host resides.

geo_loc_name_state_province_territory.name: Province
geo_loc_name_state_province_territory.description: describes the state, province, or territory of origin of the sample

pre-existing_conditions_and_risk_factors.name: Risk Factors
pre-existing_conditions_and_risk_factors.description: A medical condition that existed prior to the current infection. A variable associated with an increased risk of disease or infection.

enum: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
location_of_exposure_geo_loc_name_countr.name: Country of Exposure
location_of_exposure_geo_loc_name_countr.description: The country where the host was likely exposed to the causative agent of the illness.

prior_antiviral_treatment_during_prior_M.name: Treatment History
prior_antiviral_treatment_during_prior_M.description: Antiviral treatment for any infection during the prior Mpox infection period.
